name: Silent Kill

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Stealth 12 ranks; assassinate advanced slayer talent or ninja master trick.

sections.text: When you kill a creature during a surprise round, you can attempt a Stealth check, opposed by the Perception checks of potential observers, to prevent them from noticing your action and subsequently identifying you as the assailant.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: assassinate advanced slayer talent or ninja master trick
description: You are quite adept at killing your prey without making noise or alerting others.
